name: Alien & Fireflies (final)
description:
An alien has invaded Earth but all he wants are the fireflies! Catch as many fireflies as possible, and avoid the falling stars!

To play- Use the left & right arrow keys on your keyboard to move around, let the fireflies land on your player in order to collect 5 points. Avoid the falling stars or you'll 3 lose points. In order to win, you must get a score of 100. You lose if you get a score of less than 0!
